All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BOSS
    This is the last enemy the player will fight.
    BossFight
    BossFight is the final level of the game.
    Button
    This class contains all the buttons in the game.
    Child
    This is the Actor that the player controls.
    child_imobil
    This is used to show the character in the "How To Play" screen
    Door
    This door appears when a level is completed.
    EnemiesCount
    Used to show how many enemies there are left.
    Enemy
    This enemy can only move towards the player and damage them by touching them.
    GameOver
    This is the screen that appears when you lost the game.
    gameover_scris
    This keeps all the text from the "Game Over" screen.
    howtoplay_scris
    This keeps all the text from the "How To Play" screen.
    howtoplay1
    This contains a basic guide on how to play the game
    HP
    Used to show how much health the player has left.
    Level
    Used to show the current level the player is at.
    Level1
    First level of the game, that also starts playing the song and adds the player.
    Level10
    This is unused
    Level2
    Second level
    Level3
    Third level
    Level4
    Fourth level
    Level5
    Fifth level
    Level6
    Sixth level
    Level7
    Seventh level
    Level8
    Eighth level
    Level9
    Ninth level
    Projectile
    This is the fireball shot by the enemies.
    screen_name
    This is the first screen that appears, and redirects to the main menu when you press SPACE
    shooting_enemy
    This enemy can't move but instead shoots fireballs towards the player.
    Sword
    This is just the hitbox of the player's sword.
    TitleScreen
    This is the main menu, with 3 buttons.
    UI
    UI contains the information the player sees on screen.
    Wall
    The player and enemies can't go through this Actor.
    YouWin
    This is the screen that the player sees when they beat the game.
    Zid
    The player and enemies can't go through this Actor.
    zid2
    The player and enemies can't go through this Actor.
